unnormalised: Borem, tumka Indian Airways vishim zanno zai, hã? Tor pott'to bandhun ghe, kiteak hi thodi rollercoaster-achi vatt asa, tashi Delhi airport-ar rupiya 20-ant decent chai mellounk prayatn korpak zata tashi.
normalised: Barobar, tumkam Indian Airways vixim zanno zai asa? Mhunnlear, kas korat, kiteak mhonnlear tem ek demvo-cherdo zalea, titlench Delhi airport-acher rupiya visak decent chai melloucheak prayatn kortoleam porim.

unnormalised: Poile suvater, tumchea ak'khenchi vellar ud'donk visrun voch. Dhir dorop hem rasttrik khel zala. Zod tumchi flight sokallim 6:00 vaztam ravli asa, manasik rokhnnichi toyari korat sokallim 7:30 vaztam bhair poddonk, vo ani unch velar. "Operational issues"-ank lagun bangalore airport-ar mumbaik ud'donk 4 horam lagun aslim. Monsun rutuche vishim mhaka sangonk soddinakat. Flights dokshin-uttor radd zata, ekdom gandol asa!
normalised: Poilech pavtt, tumi asa tea vellar udhonak yevpacho visorat. Deri zalear tem ek rasttriy khell zalea. Tumi udhonak sokallim so vajeak aasa mhonnlear, tumi sat tis vajeak veta mhunn dhyanim dovorat, vo anink deri zatolem. Hanv Bangalore airport-acher char voram meren Mumbai-k vochpak ravon ravlo "operational issues" karkannak lagun. Monsoonccher uloi nakat. Udhonak rat-din cancellem zata, hem ek vollvollit kaam!

unnormalised: Magir baggage-chi purai prosn asa. Tumni vajanache maryadechi sarki dekhbhal korat, na zale tor bhari duddu divonk toyar ravhat. Te 15 kg check-in baggage allowance ani 7 kg cabin baggage limit vishim ekdom koddok astat, mhaka patyeat. IndiGo-chea staff-ak extra 2 kg baggage-acher ek aunti vad kortana mhaka disli, ani ti purai scene aslli. Sarojini Nagar-ant rupiya 300-ak ek extra bag gheun ti check-in korop zait barem!
normalised: Ani baggage-icho vishay asa. Tumi weight limit-ank zago diiat, vo tumi tho'di serious dought diunchem poddtolem. Tankam fifteen kilogram check-in baggage allowance ani seven kilogram cabin baggage limit-icher zor asat, tumi mhojer visvas dovrat. Hanven he aunty-k IndiGo staff-ancher don kilogram extra baggage-cher ghaddo ghaddichem pollailam, ani tem ek scene aslem. Tumi Sarojini Nagar-ant rupiya tin so-ak ek extra bag gheun dhokaucheak boream!

unnormalised: Pun, nyai divonk, kaim bhartiya airlines apli game bhitor ghetat. Tata-chea khal Air India-n apli seva ani fleet sudharonk prayatn korta. Te nove route ghali asa, zashi kochi thaun direct dubai-ak flights, ani ti puranne plens soddunk prayatn kortat zanchi duct tape ani prarthanen rakhonn korpak zata tashi distat. SpiceJet kadem-kadem bhari soste fares astat, zashi rupiya 999 domestik flight-ak (tum poilim book kelear ani ratri 2 vaztam bhonvlekar, tor zai). Ani vistara thodi chodd premium experience dita.
normalised: Punn, niall mhonnlear, tho'di Indian airlines aplyo gane vattounk sodtat. Tata-khala Air India apli seva ani fleet sudhortak sodta. Te nove routes ghatat, Kochi-tlean Dubai-k direct flights porim, ani te thoddi porni vimananak kaddunk sodtat ji duct tape ani prarthonek korun sambhallil'lea porim distat. SpiceJet-ak kedna-kedna khub susth fares astat, rupiya no so nonnavo ek domestic flight-ak (tumi lagim lagim book kelear ani don vajeak vochpak aasalear), ani Vistara thoddo premium experience dita.

unnormalised: Ani jevn visrunk naka. Airline food-ak, samany ritin, vait nav mellta, pun bhartiya airlines zaitin vegetarian options dita, je amchea zaitin lokank favo asa. Tumka thodi pass korpak zata dal chawal mellonk xakta vo soggy samosa, pun hey, kasuch na astak hem borem, mhunn zata, hã? Plus, tumni sodanch tumchea auychea kitchen-an thaun thode homemade theplas vo khakras bhitor ghetok zatat – tankam vaitt disna (chodd korun). Mhaji auy sodanch ek bhari dabba jevnacho pack korta zod hanv konnachench bhonvtanam. Tantun unnea thaun 3 kgs vajan asta, pun tenkem mullavont asa!
normalised: Ani khanyeachem visorat naka. Airline khanyeak, samanean, vait naam melltta, punn Indian airlines samanean decent vegetarian options ditat, je amchea zaitiank ek vhodd foido asa. Tumkam thoddhem passible dal chawal vo soggy samosa melltta, punn hey, tem kiteach na ditleam-von borem asa, kiteak na? Plus, tumi kednach tumchea maaichea kusdantlean ghora kaddun haddileam theplas vo khakras lukounk xoktat - tankam vaitt dischona (unch). Mhoji maai kednach hanv kiteak vochta tea udhonak hanvakai ek vhodd dabba khanem ghalun korta. Tantunt lagim lagim tin kilogram vajon aasa, punn tem foido ditolem!

unnormalised: Pro-tip: Sodanch, SODANCH airline-chea website-ar nove updates ani travel advisories dekhun ghe. Hi vostu sonnyache kimate thakun zollean bodal zata. Ani tanchi app download korat – ti flight status dekhonk ani boarding passes mellounk vostu sompi asun zata. Check-in counter-ar ubho ravonk stress sodd. Ani tumchem Aadhar card tumchea sovem gheun vochonk yaad dovrat, ti Identity verification-ak zai asta.
normalised: Pro-tip: Kednach, KEDNACH airlines-chea website-ant nove updates ani travel advisories-ak zann jiyat. Vostu hankam disanim sonnyache kimatik baddulta. Ani tankam app download korat - samanean hem udhonachi state pollouncheak ani boarding passes gheucheak susth vatt aasa. Check-in counter-acher asun dukhi zaupachem salvarat. Anik, tumchi Aadhar card gheun ziyat, tankam Identity verification-ak garaj aasa

unnormalised: Kadache kadache adchan pourtant, bhartant bhonvonk samanya ritin surakshit ani sompe asa. Bhitor ekdom kainch vochonk toyar ravhat, tumchem dhir pack korat, ani thode borem pustok vo bollywood movies download korat tumka nirantar velar borepnnan dovrunk. Ani bhagwanache vishim, tumchem charger visronakat. Airport-ar horam lagun astana dead phone thaun kasuch vait na. Hem hanven 2017-ant dhokkanlean xikleam. Kadinch pun vochchonam!
normalised: Kednach thoddem dukh naslem punn, Indian-ache bhitor udhonak vochpak samanean surakshit ani susth asa. Kiteim ghoddlem mhonnlear tayar ravon ziyat, tumchi xanti sambhallat, ani thoddi boream pustakam gheun ziyat vo thoddi Bollywood movies download korun ziyat tumchea derik dukh naschek dovruncheak. Ani Deva khatir, tumcho charger visorat naka. Airport-acher voram ravon ravon phone melo mhonnlear kiteak von vait na. Hanvem hem don so satranvearlean shiklem. Kednach punn!

unnormalised: Tor, hã, hi mhoji Indian Airways-chi zanni asa. Ti eksarkhi vostonchi bag asa, pun hey, ti bhartiya experience-achi ek bhag asa, mhunn asa, hã? Tumchem sas ghiavnk yaad dovrat, mushtik marat, ani tumchi hasyachi bud'dhi rakhun ghe. Ani sodanch snacks pack korat. Sodanch.
normalised: Mhunnlear, hanv Indian Airways-cher dhyan ditam. Tem ek bhonvrem baret zalea, punn hey, tem Indian-chea anubhavache bhag zalea, kiteak na? Tankam zanno diiat, punch-ancher roll korat, ani tumchi hasyachi buddhi sambhallat. Ani kednach snacks ghatat. Kednach.
